SentInvitationsCard.subtitle: List of the invitations you have sent.
SentInvitationsCard.title: Sent Invitations

SettingsPage.user-roles-description: Each user role gives different permissions within the portal. If you think you should have additional roles, please contact us.

accepted-by-journal-dialog.text: You can now mark this manuscript as having been accepted for publication by a journal. This step will create a new publication to your profile allowing you to update the publication details. Once you know the publication details, please remember to update publication record and mark it as published so that we can help share it within the DFO community.

add-pub-author-dialog.dialog-help: Search for the author you'd want to add using their name or professional email. If you cannot find the author you are looking for, or their affiliation or email has changed, you can create a new author record.
add-pub-author-dialog.title: Add an author to this publication

authentication-history-card.subtitle: Suspicious activity? Change your password and immediately report it to us.
authentication-history-card.title: Authentication History

author-expertise.info-text: Identifying an author's areas of expertise helps users understand and trust the content and find the information they need more easily. It also fosters collaboration among researchers, making it a valuable resource for our scientific community.
author-expertise.no-expertise: No expertise associated at this time.

author-select.cant-find-text: Can't find the author you're looking for?
author-select.empty-search-hint: Start typing to search for an author
author-select.hint: Start typing to search for an author (first name, last name, or email)
author-select.not-the-author-youre-looking-for: Not the author you're looking for?

change-password-card.new-password-required: Your account security is important to us. You're using a temporary or expired password, please change it now.
change-password-card.subtitle: Ensure your account is using a long (12 characters or more), random password to stay secure.
change-password-card.title: Change Your Password

common.author: Author | Authors
common.corresponding-author-desc: The corresponding author communicates with the journal(s) and is responsible for managing editorial issues and the manuscript's final format and content. This person is not necessarily the "first" author, which could have different meanings in different fields. For example, it could be a first or the last author or the person overseeing the publication process and, often, responsible for conceiving, supporting, and managing the project.
common.corresponding-author-toggle: Toggles whether this is a corresponding author
common.inactive-msg: You have been inactive for {0} minutes. You will be logged out in 2 minutes.
common.no-results-found-hint: Try adjusting your search criteria or filters to find what you're looking for.
common.primary-publication: A manuscript published by a third party
common.secondary-publication: A manuscript to be published by DFO
common.title: Title

validation.at-least-one-author: At least one corresponding author is required.
validation.emails-match: The given emails do not match
validation.no-authors: No authors, please add at least one author prior to submission.
validation.password-length: Password must be at least 12 characters
validation.passwords-different: Your current and new password should be different

create-manuscript-record-dialog.create-text: Once created, you will be taken to the manuscript record form. The manuscript record form will be marked as a draft and only be visible to you an the people you invite as observers. Once the form is complete you will be able to submit it for review.
create-manuscript-record-dialog.enter-the-title-of-your-manuscript: Enter the title of your manuscript
create-manuscript-record-dialog.primary-pub-desc: Scientific or technical document to be published in a third party journal, special issue, book chapter, book or conference proceeding
create-manuscript-record-dialog.secondary-pub-desc: Scientific or technical document to be published in a DFO Science Series
create-manuscript-record-dialog.select-region-text: Please select the lead DFO region responsible for the management review of this manuscript.

step1.text: Please select the type of manuscript you want to create based on the intended publisher.

create-manuscript-record-dialog.title: Create a New Manuscript Record Form
create-manuscript-record-dialog.what-is-the-working-title-of-your-manusc: What is the working title of your manuscript?

create-organization-dialog.p1: Once created, this organization will be available to all users. Please make sure to use the official name and abbreviation for the organization. (E.g.: do not include departments, branches or regions.)
create-organization-dialog.p2: If the name of the organization does not have an official French or English equivalent, please copy the official name in both fields.
create-organization-dialog.title: Create new Organization

step1.p1: This wizard lets you add published manuscripts to the portal; allowing you to share past publications or to add publications where the manuscript record form (MRF) was done through other means.
step1.warning: If you are here to get your manuscript reviewed by management prior to submission to a journal, do not continue, create a new manuscript record instead.

dashboard.create-your-first-manuscript-record: Create your first manuscript record form

decision.approve-and-complete-desc: You approve this manuscript for publication and are ending the management review process.
decision.approve-and-forward-desc: You recommend approval of this manuscript for publication and are forwarding it to the next reviewer.
decision.reassign-desc: You are not the correct manager to review this manuscript and reassign this review to the proper manager without making a recommendation.
decision.withhold-and-complete: Withhold and Complete the review process
decision.withhold-and-complete-desc: You withhold this manuscript for publication and are ending the management review process. Only an RDS or DG can make this decision.
decision.withhold-and-forward-desc: You recommend this manuscript be withheld for publication and are forwarding it to a higher level manager.

delete-manuscript.message: Are you sure you want to delete the manuscript titled "{title}"?
delete-manuscript.title: Delete a Manuscript

delete-manuscript-pdf.manuscript-pdf-deleted: The manuscript file was sucessfully deleted
delete-manuscript-pdf.message: This will delete the following attached manuscript file: {file}
delete-manuscript-pdf.title: Please confirm

unsaved-changes.message: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?
unsaved-changes.title: Unsaved Changes

error-invalid-signature.link-expired-text: The signed link you're using has likely expired.

expertise-select.hint: Start typing to search for an expertise

forgot-password-card.text: Don't fret, we've all been there before. Simply click the password reset button and we'll send you some instructions to get you back on track.
forgot-password-card.title: Reset Your Password

fundingSource.deleteConfirmation: Please confirm that you would like this funding source: {source}

invite-user-dialog.help: Invite a new user to the portal. The invite email will be sent to the user's email address and you will be able to know whether they have accepted the invitation under the "Sent Invitation" tab in the "Settings" menu.
invite-user-dialog.locale-hint: The invitation email will be sent using the chosen language.

journal-select.not-found-msg: Can't find the journal you're looking for? Please contact us so we can add it.
journal-select.search-hint: Start typing to search for a journal

login-card.email-verified-text: Email verified. You may now login.
login-card.new-password-required: You've been redirected because your account requires a new password.

logout-card.text: Thank you for using the Open Science Portal.
logout-card.text-inactive: You've been logged out due to inactivity.

manage-author-profile-card.current-affiliation-hint: This will not affect the affiliation of any of your past publications.
manage-author-profile-card.orcid-not-verified: You can also verify or register with ORCID using "Manage ORCID"
manage-author-profile-card.orcid-verified: This is a verified ORCID. Use the Manage ORCID to change it.

manage-funding-source-card.subtitle: If applicable, please enter the funding source(s) that have helped generate this work.

manage-manuscript-author-card.delete-author-msg: Are you sure you want to delete this author?
manage-manuscript-author-card.instructions: Enter all authors, their affiliations and at least one corresponding author. Authors will appears in the list in the order they are entered.
manage-manuscript-author-card.title: Author(s) and Affiliation(s)

manage-pub-authors.no-authors: No authors identified, please add the publication authors here.

management-review-guidelines.subtitle: Please refer to the National Policy for Science Publications for more details.
management-review-guidelines.tip-one: Reviews the manuscript for compliance with the Intellectual Property Policy/Copyright Act, the Privacy Act, the Financial Administration Act (with respect to approvals of publication costs) and the Values and Ethics Code for DFO.
management-review-guidelines.tip-three: At no time, will the inclusion of sensitive material (e.g. data, scientific conclusions) prevent publication of scientific papers.
management-review-guidelines.tip-two: Review the manuscript to identify sensitive issues, solely for the purpose of briefing senior management and the Communications Branch prior to publication of the science paper. Identified sensitive issues must be added to the form's "Sensitive Issues" section.
management-review-guidelines.title: Management Review Guidelines

management-review-step-view.not-started-submit-your-form-to-begin: Not Started - Submit your form to begin
management-review-step-view.title: Management Review

manuscript-author-dialog.instructions: Search for the author you'd want to add using their name or professional email. If you cannot find the author you are looking for, or their affiliation or email has changed, you can create a new author record.
manuscript-author-dialog.title: Add an author to this manuscript

manuscript-progress-view.accepted-details: The manuscript was accepted for publication by the target journal and is entering the production process. Confirming this step will create a new publication record where you can upload the final manuscript and update the publication details.
manuscript-progress-view.completed-details: The manuscript complies with Fisheries and Oceans Canada National Policy for Science Publications and is approved by DFO management. At this stage, you may now submit the manuscript to your target journal.
manuscript-progress-view.completed-withheld-details: The manuscript does not comply with Fisheries and Oceans Canada National Policy for Science Publications and is withheld by DFO management.
manuscript-progress-view.created-details: At this stage, only the applicant and authors can see and edit the manuscript record.
manuscript-progress-view.submit-management-details: The manuscript is initially submitted to a division manager or director (NCR) for management review.
manuscript-progress-view.submit-pub-details: The manuscript was submitted for peer-review. We track this stage to gather statistics on the time it takes to get manuscripts accepted and published.
manuscript-progress-view.title: Manuscript Progress
manuscript-progress-view.withdrawn-details: The manuscript was withdrawn by the applicant. The manuscript record will be archived after 30 days.

mrf.abstract-must-be-at-least-250-characters: Abstract must be at least 250 characters
mrf.additional-text: Examples of topics of potential public interest could include subjects related to current events, or of stakeholder interest. These can include interesting stories to showcase DFO research or studies that are more controversial. While this will never restrict publications in any way, this will serve to engage with, and inform our Communications colleagues. If it is deemed that a manuscript could be of public interest, the Communications team will be notified after the management review process, and again when the manuscript is marked as published by the applicant.
mrf.geographical-text: Describe the geographical scope/region and (if applicable) species (to include common names) of the paper.
mrf.lead-region-text: Select the DFO region responsible for the management review of this manuscript. If more than one region is responsible, select the region that will lead the review.
mrf.manuscript-submitted-successfully: The manuscript record was sucessfully submitted.
mrf.not-authorized-text: You do not have permission to view this manuscript record
mrf.pls-already-generated-erase-it-to-genera: PLS already generated - erase it to generate a new one
mrf.pls-help-ai-text: Need some help? Using your manuscript's abstract, we can generate a draft PLS. Make sure to review/edit the generated PLS!
mrf.pls-text: Plain Language Summary (PLS) of the manuscript to explain the relevance of the science to the Department and to promote the value of science through outreach and communication. It is intended for internal use to identify linkages to programs, policies and stakeholders and for use in the plain language promotion of science.
mrf.potential-media-interest-question: Is this manuscript of potential public interest?
mrf.potential-media-interest-text-field-text: Optionally, please provide any pertinent information concerning the potential public interest.
mrf.ready-to-marked-published: This manuscript has been reviewed but still needs to be marked as published by the applicant.
mrf.relevant-text: Describe how this manuscript is relevant to the program that funded it, how it supports the department's madate, strategic plan and or/regional priorities.
mrf.replace-manuscript: Upload a new version of the manuscript
mrf.scientific-implication-text: Describe the scientific implications of the paper. (i.e. field, importance, focus, purpose, benefits, etc.)
mrf.sharing-confirm-delete-message: Please confirm the removal of {userName}'s access to this record.
mrf.sharing-subtitle: Share this manuscript with others users
mrf.submit-tooltip-disabled: Please complete all sections and save to submit
mrf.upload-hint: Only PDF files are accepted. Maximum file size is {max}MB.
mrf.upload-text: Upload the most recent copy of your manuscript as a PDF. This file can be updated as required by the applicant, even after submitting the manuscript.
mrf.working-title-text: Enter to the manuscript's working title. You will be able to modify the title when you update this manuscript status to published.

my-manuscript-records.no-manuscript: No manuscripts record form exist or are shared with you

my-publication-view.i-am-responsible-for-this-publication-re: I am responsible for this publication record

no-management-review.subtitle: Manuscripts you've recently been asked to review will appear here.
no-management-review.title: You have nothing to review

no-manuscript-exists-div.p1: Need to publish a primary or secondary publication? You've come to the right place. Create a manuscript record and start the process of publishing your manuscript following the national policy for science publications.
no-manuscript-exists-div.p2: The national policy ensures a consistent treatment of scientific publications across DFO regions, recognition of the scientific impact of the Department through the use of a standard affiliation, and effective tracking of our publications to better integrate science into departmental processes.

no-publication-exist-div.p1: Manuscripts that have been reviewed will appear here. Once published, you can update the publication details. You can also add any past publications here so that it is part of our database and available for all to see.

ocrid.verify-btn-text: Create or connect your ORCID iD

orcid.already-verified-text: Your ORCID has been successfully verified with ORCID.org. If you'd like to change it or verify it again, click below.
orcid.verify-header-text: Connect your ORCID iD (or register for an iD)

organization-select.cant-find: Can't find the organization you're looking for?
organization-select.hint: Start typing to search for an organization

osp.description: The Open Science Portal is an intuitive web-based application to promote open science and track science publications within Fisheries and Oceans Canada.

policy.for-more-info: For more information please refer to the {policy}.

message.p1: Reviews the manuscript for compliance with the {copyrightsAct}, the {privacyAct}, the Financial Administration Act (with respect to approvals of publication costs) and the {valueAndEthicsCode}.
message.p2: Identifies when a manuscript is of potential public interest for the sole purpose of informing RDS and DFO regional Communications. Examples of topics of potential public interest could include subjects related to current events, or of stakeholder interest. These can include interesting stories to show case DFO research or studies that are more controversial. The inclusion of potentially sensitive material will never prevent the publication of a manuscript in any way.

policy.national-policy-for-science-publications: Fisheries and Oceans Canada National Policy for Science Publications
policy.p2: Science management commits to a 10 working-day turnaround for sign-off of manuscripts for publication. If managers do not respond with an approval within 10 working days, authors may submit their manuscripts to the publisher.
policy.values-and-ethics-code-for-dfo: Values and Ethics Code for DFO

pub-author-dialog.are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-this-aut: Are you sure you want to delete this author?

publication-page.attach-pub-details: Upload the most recent copy of your publication as a PDF. We will not allow portal users to download this file until the end of its embargo period.
publication-page.title: Publication

registered.text: Please check your email ({0}) for a confirmation link. To protect your account, you will not be able to login until you've confirmed your email address.

required-span.definition: Fields marked with an * are required.

reviewer-comments.description: Comments are required unless you approve and complete the management review without sending it to another manager. Comments entered here should support your decision and, if applicable, provide feedback to the subsequent management reviewer. Your comments will be visible to anyone with access to this manuscript record.
reviewer-comments.title: Manger Comments

shareable-dialog.abilities-text: By default, the user has the ability to view the ressource. You can also allow th user to edit and delete this resource.
shareable-dialog.expiry-date-text: By default, the resource is shared until you manually remove the ability. If you prefer, you can also set an expiration date at which time the user will no longer be able to access this resource.
shareable-dialog.user-create-text: User with whom you want to share. The user will receive an email notification once you share this resource.

submit-decision-dialog.certify-text: I certify that, to the best of my knowledge, my decision is based on the guidelines outlined in the DFO National Policy for Science publications. If applicable, I have read the comments provided by the previous manager and have considered them in my decision.
submit-decision-dialog.next-reviewer-hint: Search for the appropriate person to complete the management review within the user list. If you cannot find their name, they are likely not yet registered, and you will be able to invite them to the portal.
submit-decision-dialog.no-comments-warning: Your mangement review has no comments. Therefore, you can only approve and complete this review. Please add comments to support your decision if you want to select from the other options.
submit-decision-dialog.subsequent-reviewer-is-required: Given your decision, a subsequent manager is required to complete the review

step1.confirmation-text: I certify that, to the best of my knowledge, this manuscript is in compliance with the Intellectual Property Policy/Copyright Act, the Privacy Act, the Financial Administration Act (with respect to approvals of publication costs), and the Values and Ethics Code for DFO.
step1.subtitle: Submission for Management Review
step1.title: Confirm Submission

step2.p1: To submit the manuscript for management review, search for the appropriate division manager/director within the user list. If you cannot find their name, they are likely not yet registered, and you will be able to invite them to the portal.
step2.p2: Note; you will not be able to select someone that is an author on this manuscript or the owner of this manuscript record.
step2.subtitle: Division Manager/Director
step2.title: Select Management Reviewer

submitted-to-journal-dialog.text: Mark this manuscript as having been submitted to a journal. This step lets all users involved in the management review know that you submitted your manuscript for publication.
submitted-to-journal-dialog.title: Update the manuscript status as submitted

user-profile.email-hint: Your verified email address cannot be changed manually.

user-select.cant-find-the-user-youre-looking-for: Can't find the user you're looking for?
user-select.not-the-user-youre-looking-for: Not the user you're looking for?
user-select.start-typing-to-search-for-a-user: Start typing to search for a user

withdraw-manuscript-dialog.text: Withdraw this manuscript. This lets us know that this manuscript will not be published and closes this manuscript record.
withdraw-manuscript-dialog.title: Withdraw this manuscript
